title: Orzo Pasta with Chicken and Pesto

ingredients.content: 40 g Parmesan cheese, cut in pieces
400 g chicken breasts, skinless, cut in cubes (3 cm)
1 heaped tbsp chicken stock paste, homemade
250 g dry pasta, type orzo, or similar short dried pasta

preparations.content: Place Parmesan cheese in mixing bowl and grate <b>15 sec/speed 10<b>.
Add pine nuts, garlic clove, basil leaves and olive oil then chop <b>10 sec/speed 7<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Chop again <b>10 sec/speed 7<b>. Transfer pesto to a bowl and set aside.
Place carrots, leeks and olive oil in mixing bowl then chop <b>5 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl using spatula.
Add chicken breasts, chicken stock paste, water and salt then cook <b>10 min/100°C//speed <b>.
Add green peas and orzo pasta then cook <b>time indicated on packet/100°C//speed <b>.
Add reserved pesto and combine gently using spatula. Serve immediately.
